RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LBTBS_PART_CCY_RESTR_MASTER.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_PART_CCY_RESTR_DETAIL.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_PART_CCY_RESTR_MASTER.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_PART_CCY_RESTR_DETAIL.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_PART_CCY_RESTR_MASTER.CURRENCY = LBTBS_PART_CCY_RESTR_DETAIL.CURRENCY AND LBTBS_PART_CCY_RESTR_MASTER.LIMIT_TYPE = LBTBS_PART_CCY_RESTR_DETAIL.LIMIT_TYPE

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT ccy_code, ccy_name FROM cytms_ccy_defn WHERE ? = 'AL' UNION select '*.*', 'ALL CURRENCIES' FROM DUAL WHERE ? <> 'AL'

select customer_no, customer_name1 from oltms_customer where once_auth='Y' AND customer_no IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(?, '[^#]+', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(?, '[^#]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)
